Script for Patient

Global script GlobalScript

Alicia Droid: She looks very serious and a little scary.
[PATI] Patient: I'm right here. I can hear you.
Alicia Droid: Sorry.
[PATI] Patient: Don't be, just give me the package.

Alicia Droid: Not in my protocol to touch clients.
[PATI] Patient: Thank God for that. Also, who are you talking to?

Alicia Droid: Here is your package! Thank you for using DroidDash. Don't forget to review.
[PATI] Patient: Finally!
[PATI] Patient: Perfect. One extra-long nylon rope.
[PATI] Patient: Now just a quick scramble out the window.
[PATI] Patient: You'll get your 5 stars. Don't worry Droid. See ya!
Alicia Droid: Another satisfied customer!
Narrator: Congrats, you Win!

Room 5 – Room 53

[PATI] Patient: Holy Smokes! I can't believe that worked!
Alicia Droid: Guaranteed delivery, no matter the...
[PATI] Patient: Yeah whatever. Do you have my package?

Alicia Droid: A beautiful view of the Hospital grounds.
[PATI] Patient: Who you talking to?

Alicia Droid: I have no reason to mess with the window.
[PATI] Patient: Yeah, no kidding. You got my package?

Alicia Droid: A institutional bed.
[PATI] Patient: Yep. My package please.

Alicia Droid: I just do deliveries. Making beds is not in my protocal.
[PATI] Patient: You know what is? Giving me my package.
